mutants.code:
def convert_days(days):
    sign = -1 if days < 0 else 1
    days = abs(days)
    years = days / 365
    days = days % 365
    months = days // 30
    days = days % 30
    weeks = days // 7
    days = days % 7
    return (sign * years, sign * months, sign * weeks, sign * days)

    return (sign * years, sign * months, sign * weeks, sign * days)
